verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, Jesus You’re Holy Holy is the Lord, Holy, Jesus You’re Holy, Holy is the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worthy, Jesus You’re Worthy, Worthy is the Lord. Worthy, Jesus You’re Worthy, Worthy is the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faithful, Jesus You’re Faithful, Faithful is the Lord. Faithful, Jesus You’re Faithful, Faithful is the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Coming, Jesus You’re coming, Coming is the Lord. Coming, Jesus You’re coming, Coming is the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory, we give You glory, Glory to our God. Glory, we give you glory, Glory to our God.{/lang-eng}
